name: Forest Rescue RUN
description:
The day of the big race has come. The forest animals have been training hard.
Today they will finally get the chance to see who can clear the most obstacles and reach the top of the highest tree in the forest.
Test your reflexes with one-touch controls when you Jump and Duck to avoid obstacles. Win coins and unlock new characters by clearing the most obstacles, as you reach for the top!
Can you beat your friends' score?

* High Quality Colourful Graphics
* Challenge your friends to a race!
* Super Easy Controls
* Win Coins and Unlock Characters
* Join the Race, Flex Your Muscles
